enb_long_title: Ninth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: The conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2003/L.19) address cooperation with other conventions, and cooperation with scientific organizations and UN bodies.

On cooperation with other conventions, SBSTA notes the distinct mandates and independent status of each convention, reiterates the importance of promoting synergies at the national and local levels where implementation occurs, and encourages Parties to strive for coherence in the implementation of the conventions.
